descript.abstract: This dataset depicts the alignment of all existing transitway alignments. Transitways include light rail, commuter rail and Bus Rapid Transit (BRT) alignments. The geography was created by using heads-up digitizing referencing aerial photography.
descript.purpose: To have a general depiction of the transitway alignments.
descript.supplinf: Twin Cities 7 county metropolitan area. This includes the counties of Anoka, Carver, Dakota, Hennepin, Ramsey, Scott and Washington.

timeperd.current: This dataset is current as of the Time Period of Content date.

theme.themekey: Light Rail Transit, transit, transporation, buses, Red Line, Blue Line, Northstar Commuter Rail, Green Line

place.placekey: Twin Cities, Hennepin County, City of Minneapolis, City of Bloomington, Unorganized Territory of Fort Snelling, MSP, Minneapolis-St. Paul International Airport

attracc.attraccr: Station origin and destination segments are generally reflective the branded name of the station. Mileages are based on the GIS software measurements of the polylines.

horizpa.horizpar: This dataset was created using heads-up digitizing from aerial orthophotography.

procstep.procdesc: The dataset was created by using heads-up digitizing referencing aerial photography.

overview.eaover:
ATTRIBUTES:
route: A string identifying the number associated with the route and its schedules.
routesort: The route number of the transitway.
Direction: The general direction of the transitway alignment.
FromStat: The origin station of a station to station segment.
ToStat: The destination station of a station to station segment.
Miles: The estimated mileage of the segment
Name: Transitway name
Transitway: The transitway name (blue line, red line, etc.)
TrackID: A unique identification number for each track segment
Type: The transportation type used on the transitway

distinfo.distliab: NOTICE: The Geographic Information System (GIS) Data to which this notice is attached are made available pursuant to the Minnesota Government Data Practices Act (Minnesota Statutes Chapter 13). THE GIS DATA ARE PROVIDED TO YOU AS IS AND WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY AS TO THEIR PERFORMANCE, MERCHANTABILITY, OR FITNESS FOR ANY PARTICULAR PURPOSE. The GIS Data were developed by the Metropolitan Council for its own internal business purposes. The Metropolitan Council does not represent or warrant that the GIS Data or the data documentation are error-free, complete, current, or accurate. You are responsible for any consequences resulting from your use of the GIS Data or your reliance on the GIS Data. You should consult the data documentation for this particular GIS Data to determine the limitations of the GIS Data and the precision with which the GIS Data may depict distance, direction, location, or other geographic features. If you transmit or provide the GIS Data (or any portion of it) to another user, it is recommended that the GIS Data include a copy of this disclaimer and this metadata.

digtinfo.transize: Less than 1 Mb for zip file.
